levels.description: ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> and attacks one additional target. Enemies within attack range that are not Elites or Leaders have <@ba.vup>{attack@move_speed:0%}</> Movement Speed; each affected enemy defeated increases Talent effect by <@ba.vup>{attack@talent_up:0.0}</>x, up to <@ba.vup>{attack@max_talent_up:0.0}</>x, until this skill ends
